material: neoprene coating, cast iron core, plastic rack
usage: dumbbell exercises including bicep curls, tricep extensions, lunges, squats, cardio, shoulder press
key_features: precision hex shape for ground stability
ai_description: A complete dumbbell set featuring a black plastic rack holding three pairs of brightly colored neoprene-coated dumbbells. The weights are arranged by size and color: yellow (1 KG) on top, red (1.5 KG) in the middle, and purple (2 KG) on the bottom. Each dumbbell has a hexagonal shape with ergonomic handles. The packaging graphics emphasize key safety features with icons and text highlighting non-toxic materials, smell-proof construction, and easy washability. A circular guarantee seal with gold edging and black/silver accents reinforces the product's quality claims.
target_audience: home gym users and commercial gyms
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
